about_the_game:
In Eclipse of Elysium, you step into the shoes of 21-year-old Aria. At first glance, she appears to be a young, unassuming woman who wouldn't harm a fly. But appearances can be deceiving. In reality, Aria is a biological weapon, deployed on the most dangerous missions in Eldora. Will you guide Aria to become a guardian angel, protecting the innocent, or a ruthless assassin fulfilling the orders of the powerful and wealthy?



Aria's emotional landscape is turbulent at best. Impulsive, fierce, and often consumed by rage, she embodies the unpredictability of a storm. However, like the calm after a tempest, she can also exhibit kindness and a willingness to aid those around her. The emotional path Aria treads is yours to shape. Will you navigate her through the darkness with a compassionate heart, or will rage be her guide? The choice is yours.



Serving the "Python Network," one of the most critical intelligence services of the Republic, Aria operates in the shadows. She's the one called upon when danger looms, or when tasks demand a leap outside the boundaries of legality. Her hands are the ones that get dirty, fighting battles unseen and undertaking missions that others dare not whisper about.

At the helm of Aria's assignments is Liaison Officer Krall, a member of the Scalekrin—an ancient race of lizard people long oppressed. Krall has climbed the ranks through sheer determination and now stands as a pivotal figure within the Python Network. His loyalty to the organization is unwavering, and he will do whatever it takes to secure his standing, guiding Aria through the network's dark web of intrigue and espionage.



In this shadowed world, every decision, every alliance, and every battle shapes the destiny not only of Aria but also of Eldora itself. What will your choices reveal?





Charon, was once among the most influential figures in Endora. As the chief advisor to the Merchants' Guild, his knowledge, experience, and wisdom were highly valued, and his counsel was eagerly sought after.



However, those who knew him witnessed Charon's gradual descent into madness, a process that began when he started investigating the origins of the mysterious Conflux. This dangerous organism relentlessly spreads across the world, engulfing villages, cities, and even entire kingdoms in its path.

Charon's intent was to halt this threat, leading him to the ruins of ancient civilizations. Yet, as his investigations deepened, he became increasingly reticent and enveloped in secrets. Five years ago, Charon vanished from the public eye. Now, he has reemerged, leading a mysterious order that is working to accelerate the growth of the Conflux.



To be honest, I'm a newcomer in the video game industry. I've been gaming since I commandeered my sister's Super Nintendo at the age of 10. But the dream of developing my own video game only took hold three years ago when I tried out Unreal Engine for the first time and quickly realized the boundless possibilities it offers.



My dream is to create a game that merges the best of two worlds. I'd like to combine the charm and pathos of a JRPG like Xenoblade with the vast freedom of choice found in Western RPGs like Baldur's Gate. The adventure should be easily accessible. There are no complex mechanics preventing you from quickly getting into the game. I also want to avoid grinding that unnecessarily prolongs playtime.

I aim to create a cinematic work that takes players on an emotional journey, presenting them with tough emotional choices and introducing them to charming and complex characters.
